Uses of Package
network.client

  • Packages that use network.client 
    Package Description
    game
    Contains all files concerning the gameplay.
    game.ai
    Contains all files concerning AI players.
    game.board
    Contains all files concerning the game board.
    game.board.construction.localities
    Contains all files concerning localities.
    game.board.construction.roads
    Contains all files concerning roads.
    game.board.corners
    Contains all files concerning corners.
    game.board.edges
    Contains all files concerning edges.
    game.board.harbors
    Contains all files concerning harbors.
    game.board.hexes
    Contains all files concerning hexes.
    game.board.robber
    Contains all files concerning robbers.
    game.cards
    Contains all files concerning cards in general.
    game.dice
    Contains all files concerning dice.
    game.player
    Contains all files concerning players.
    game.resources
    Contains all files concerning resources.
    game.trade
    Contains all files concerning trades.
    game.trade.tradeparticipant
    Contains all files concerning trade participants.
    interfaces
    Contains the interfaces.
    lobby.buttons
    Contains all files concerning the buttons area of the game lobby.
    lobby.chat
    Contains all files concerning the chat area of the game lobby.
    lobby.endscreen
    Contains all files concerning the post-game screen.
    lobby.menu
    Contains all files concerning the menu area of the game lobby.
    lobby.playerarea
    Contains all files concerning the player area of the game lobby.
    lobby.playerarea.playerareacell
    Contains all files concerning the representation of a single player inside the player area of the game lobby.
    main
    Contains the main class and all files concerning this program in general.
    network.client
    Contains all files concerning clients.
    users
    Contains all files concerning users.
  • Classes in network.client used by game 
    Class and Description
    ClientConnection
    Represents a thread on the client-side which handles the communication with a server.
